resources.string: TERMS AND CONDITIONS OF USE APP

TERMS AND CONDITIONS OF APP USE The terms and conditions are an important agreement that must be included on your website or app. It is not required by law, but it is important count on them. It is the agreement that establishes the rules and guidelines for its users.
With an agreement of terms and conditions, you will retain your rights to terminate access to the website or application to the These Terms and Conditions of Use regulate the rules to which the use of the APP is subject ____________________ (hereinafter, the APP), which can be downloaded from the domain _______________________________ The download or use of the APP attributes the condition of User to whom it does and implies acceptance of all the conditions included in this document and in the Privacy Policy and Legal Notice of said website. The User should read these conditions each time you use the APP, as they could be modified in the future. 2. Only Users expressly authorized by XXXEMPRESAXXX may access the download and use the APP. Users who do not have authorization will not be able to access said content. 3. Charges: You are responsible for paying all costs or expenses that you incur as a result of download and use the XXXEMPRESAXXX Application, including any operator network charges or roaming. Check with your service provider for details. 4. Anonymous statistics: XXXEMPRESAXXX reserves the right to track your activity in the Application of and to inform our providers of statistical services of third parties. All this anonymously. 5. Protection of your personal information: we want to help you carry out all the necessary steps to protect your privacy and information. Consult the Privacy Policy of XXXEMPRESAXXX and the notices about privacy of the Application to know what type of information we collect and the measures we take to protect your personal information. 6. It is forbidden to alter or modify any part of the APP other than those contained therein, circumvent, deactivate or otherwise manipulate (or try to circumvent, deactivate or manipulate) the security functions or other functions of the program and use the APP or its contents for a purpose commercial or advertising. The use of the APP for the purpose of damaging property is prohibited, rights or interests of XXXEMPRESAXXX or third parties. It is also prohibited to carry out any other use that alters, damages or disables the networks, servers, equipment, products and programs computer science of XXXEMPRESAXXX or third parties. 7. The APP and its contents (texts, photographs, graphics, images, technology, software, links, content, graphic design, source code, etc.), as well as trademarks and other distinctive signs are owned by XXXEMPRESAXXX or third parties, the User not acquiring any right over them by the mere use of the APP. The User must refrain from: a) Reproduce, copy, distribute, make available to third parties, publicly communicate, transform or modify the APP or its contents, except in the cases contemplated by law or expressly authorized by XXXEMPRESAXXX or by the owner of said rights. b) Reproduce or copy the APP or its contents for private use, as well as communicate them publicly or make them available to third parties when this leads to their reproduction. c) Extract or reuse all or a substantial part of the contents of the
